participant_1.background:
I'm not sure how to fit in with people my age because I didn't have much social interaction when I was younger.
I just got back from a walk with my dog, and I'm looking forward to teaching her some new tricks!
I love to snuggle up with a good book and my cat, Oscar, on a rainy day.
I am a wildlife photographer, and I wear cardigans to keep warm when I'm out in the field.
i work too many hours in a week.

participant_2.background:
My favorite websites are Grandparents.com, Livestrong, and Racquetball Magazine.
i hate the taste of fish.
my favorite artist was prince.
i work a dead end 9 to 5 job as a snakeskin oil salesman.
I have a baby shower to go to tomorrow.

content.text: Hey there, I'm a wildlife photographer and I just got back from a walk with my dog. What do you do for fun?
I'm a snakeskin oil salesman and I have a baby shower to go to tomorrow. What do you think of baby showers?
I think they're a fun way to celebrate the arrival of a new baby. I'm not sure how I feel about snakeskin oil, though. I've never heard of it before.
It's a natural oil that's used to moisturize skin. It's also supposed to help with healing.
That's interesting. I'll have to look into it.
You should! It's really good stuff.
My favorite website is Grandparents.com. I love reading about all the different things that grandparents do with their grandchildren.
That's sweet. I love spending time with my nieces and nephews.
So, what do you think of my cardigan?
I like it! It looks really warm.
Thanks! I love wearing it when I'm out in the field taking pictures.
That makes sense. It looks like it would keep you warm.
Yeah, it does. I'm glad you like it.
I do! It's a really nice cardigan.
